section.title: Using the search result view
section.para: The Search Result View shows any items found during a search – either via the search dialog or the ”Show where used” action.
From the Search Result View, you can:

listitem.para: Double-click on an item to open its editor.
Re-run the search using the button in the top right-hand corner of the view.
Perform various actions on your search results ()

section.title: Using search results to make wide-reaching changes to your Project
section.para: Once you have performed a search, you can perform specific actions on the results:

listitem.para: You can replace a Test Case at multiple places where it has been reused with another Test Case ().
You can change the column of a central test data set used by any Test Cases that use this central test data set ().
